feature.name: Second Wind
feature.shortDescription: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

feature.name: Archery
feature.shortDescription: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

feature.name: Defense
feature.shortDescription: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

feature.name: Dueling
feature.shortDescription: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

feature.name: Great Weapon Fighting
feature.shortDescription: When you roll a 1 or a 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon that you are wielding with two hands, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. The weapon must have the two-handed or versatile property for you to gain this benefit.

feature.name: Protection
feature.shortDescription: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose a disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.

feature.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
feature.shortDescription: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add you ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

feature.name: Action Surge
feature.shortDescription: On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.

feature.name: Extra Attack
feature.shortDescription: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

feature.name: Indomitable
feature.shortDescription: You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll.

feature.name: Extra Attack
feature.extensionDescription: You gain an additional attack per action, up to three now.
feature.shortDescription: You can attack three times, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

feature.name: Indomitable
feature.extensionDescription: You gain an additional use of Indomitable, up to 2 per long rest now.

feature.name: Indomitable
feature.extensionDescription: You gain an additional use of Indomitable, up to 3 per long rest now.

feature.name: Action Surge
feature.extensionDescription: You gain an additional use of Action Surge.

feature.name: Extra Attack
feature.extensionDescription: You gain yet an additional attack per action, up to four now.
feature.shortDescription: You can attack four times, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
